Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package prometheus for versions less than 2.45.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-41717 affecting package prometheus for versions less than 2.45.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus is earlier than 2.45.4-1, affected by CVE-2022-41717
